alert.note: Alert for Northern Cayuga; Wayne (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lakeshore Flood Warning issued February 19 at 2:51AM EST until February 19 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...LAKESHORE FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 10 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Lakeshore flooding expected. * WHERE...Lake Ontario shore of Wayne and Northern Cayuga counties. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 10 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...The combination of significant wave action and strong onshore winds will result in lakeshore flooding along the immediate lakeshore, especially in bays, inlets, harbors, and other low lying areas along the shoreline. Shoreline erosion is also expected.
info.instruction: A Lakeshore Flood Warning means lakeshore flooding is occurring, is imminent, or is expected to occur. For your safety, stay off breakwaters, piers, rock outcroppings and beaches! Waves are often larger than they appear and can easily wash you away. Expect significant beach erosion and debris, local road closures and extremely dangerous boating conditions.
